DailyUI

DailyUI is a challenge avaliable in  DailyUI.
The objective is to face 100 diferent challenges in 100 days.
Every image is the result of each challenge with the corresponding pitch and explanations.
DailyUI #001 was to build a sign up. It could be a full page, a modal, an app screen.
I went for the app screen, since it's the major focus of the projects being build nowadays. The idea was to make it simple, yet charming and to give a context of a playtime, somewhere the remind you of the moments of waking up in a saturday morning and playing videogames until everyone else in you house had woke up.
The #002 challenge was to do a checkout form or page.
The working process was to continue the work made in challenge #001, as it was the checkout page for a toy being bought in the first app. Therefore, it followed the same principles.
Number #003 asked to design a landing page. Some of the examples were a book, an album, a mobile app or a product.
I already had an album cover made previously, so I worked to make a landing page for its release.
It's an image about how the precepts of French Illuminism could and should be followed all around the world.
